Module hu.unipannon.virt.plot

Package hu.unipannon.virt.plot.control

The control package contains classes that implement plot settings and configuration. The controllers work with data provided by the data storage classes, and operate on a Frame. Controllers can be used as an abstraction layer on top of the low-level Frame graphics.
Author:
Tóth Bálint
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AxisGenerator
    Provides automatically generated divisor points for the controllers to use.
    BarController
    PlotSpaceController implementation responsible of handling a Bar Plot.
    FrameController
    The Frame Controller handles all the frame settings that are the same for every plot type: axes, legend etc.
    HBarController
    PlotSpaceController implementation responsible of handling a Horizontal Bar Plot.
    LinePlotController
    PlotSpaceController implementation responsible of handling a Line Plot.
    LogPlotController
    PlotSpaceController implementation responsible of handling a Logarithmic Line Plot.
    PlotSpaceController
    This abstract class provides the plot-specific control functionallity inside a Frrame.
    PlotSpaceController.RefLine
    Class to store properties of reference lines.
    ScatterPlotController
    PlotSpaceController implementation responsible of handling a Scatter Plot.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FrameController.TickDir
    Represents tick directon related to the axis line.
    FrameController.XLocation
    Represents possible locations of the horizontal axis.
    FrameController.YLocation
    Represents possible locations of the vertical axis.
    PlotSpaceController.LegendLocation
    Possible mounting points for the legend box specified by MATLAB.
